title: Tutorial: Using Debezium JDBC Connector
content: Debezium is an open-source CDC (Change Data Capture) platform that allows you to capture and stream database changes in real-time. The Debezium JDBC Connector enables you to monitor changes in relational databases, like PostgreSQL, and stream those changes to various downstream systems.
